game_start: Welcome to Drake's favourite TV show, the Thirst Games.
Welcome to my malevolent shrine, The Thirst Games
combat_start: {a} stalks {d}. Lets take a closer look.
While enjoying a bit of roasted goose liver, {a} notices {d} trying to.. what is {df} doing?! hell nahhh
While enjoying a bit of roasted goose cock, {a} notices a {df} prancing around. Lets take a closer look.
{a} detects a {d} on their nerd detector.

{a} notices {d}, and charges towards him. He begins to speak.
{a}:Everything that you thought had meaning: every hope, dream, or moment of happiness. None of it matters as you lie bleeding out on the battlefield. None of it changes what a speeding rock does to a body, we all die. But does that mean our lives are meaningless? Does that mean that there was no point in our being born? Would you say that of our slain comrades? What about their lives? Were they meaningless?... They were not! Their memory serves as an example to us all! The courageous fallen! The anguished fallen! Their lives have meaning because we the living refuse to forget them! And as we ride to certain death, we trust our successors to do the same for us! Because my soldiers do not buckle or yield when faced with the cruelty of this world! My soldiers push forward! My soldiers scream out! My soldiers RAAAAAGE!

attacker_win: {af} {al} absolutely pieces up {df}, na na na na, hey hey hey, goodbye.
{a} uses the power of friendship... and fucks the shit out of {d}. You got a friend in me he said.
{a} sliced off {d}'s head with a sword.
{d} got a 'spear' inserted into their rectum. ;)

{a}, pinned down by {d}, is about to get finished off. They see their life flash before their eyes. No, I can't die today, says {a}, and with the power of friendship and plot armor, a conveniently placed chainsaw was beside them and bashed {d}'s skull.
{a} slices {d}'s head off as they proclaim, This is my perfect victory!
defender_win: {d} turns around and farts on {a}. Disgusting!

{df}: Would you lose?
{af}: Nah, I'd win.
{a} got completely fisted by {d}.

As {af} charged at {df}, {df} suddenly screamed something.
{df}: No, please {al}-senpai! Spare me!
{af}, flustered, fainted into a convenient {af}-sized hole.
{d} used Love Breathing: Nineth Form: Instant Love! {a} faints. {df} is now... oh god
{a} gets blasted into the fourth wall.
attacker_flees: Although {af} started this mess, now they're getting out. p*ssy
{a} was about to finish {d} off, but remembered his cat needed to be fed. Oh fuck.
defender_flees: {af} used Cursed Technique: Freaky. {df} ran away. (PS this is not an actual ability, don't search it up)

{a}: Oy, oy, oy... baka!
{d}: Why are you speaking japanese?
{al}: Me, the almighty {a} the Great, shall finish you off... at a duel at high noon!
{d}: Oy you're taking up too much space, we don't have the budget for this dialogue-
 {d} flees due to lack of budget.

attackers_turn: {a} tried swinging a sword but got blocked by {d}.
{df} used their almighty cock technique. {af} got flustered.
Right as {df} aimed their bow, {af} took out their Death Note.
{a} used Domain Expansion: Benevolent Shrine. It did jack shit cause bro is not Sukuna, even if they were, eh...
defenders_turn: {d} tried farting, but {a} blocked their nose in time.
{af} started flirting. Is {df} gonna be able to resist those eyes?
Mid-swing, {af} evaded and started Total Distracted Breathing.
{d} is going to finish this off, right? Sike, {d} dipped

draw: {a} and {d} make amends and make out.

{df}: Yo, I'm kinda tired
{af}: Yeah, same
They lived happily ever after.
{af} pulled out his Drake, causing {df} to run away.
Make sure to buy some Thirst Games merch! Oh and they both ran away
By the way, this game is sponsored by Raid Shadow Legends- oh they just left. Aww man.

As the fight ensues, {af} pauses and speaks.
{a}: Why must we fight? I think we are in some game.
{d}: Yunno what, yeah. I've been suspecting that...
{a}: Nevermind, its a stupid theory. Do you wanna get some starbucks?
{d}: I'm down!
